entry.title: Announcement for Bioinformatics Class (BLG 348E) at ITU

link.title: Announcement for Bioinformatics Class (BLG 348E) at ITU

entry.content: We are now offering an undergraduate class on Bioinformatics as part of the ITU Computer Engineering curriculum for third-year students. Check out the BLG 348E - Introduction to Bioinformatics at ITU course offerings list for Fall 2023.
entry.summary: We are now offering an undergraduate class on Bioinformatics as part of the ITU Computer Engineering curriculum for third-year students. Check out the BLG 348E - Introduction to Bioinformatics at ITU course offerings list for Fall 2023.

entry.title: Presentations by Drs. Mehmet Baysan and Ali Cakmak at ITU-TUSEB Collaboration Workshop

link.title: Presentations by Drs. Mehmet Baysan and Ali Cakmak at ITU-TUSEB Collaboration Workshop

entry.content: Drs. Mehmet Baysan and Ali Cakmak present the Bioinformatics Labs research activities at ITU - TUSEB collaboration workshop held in Maslak Hilton Hotel.
entry.summary: Drs. Mehmet Baysan and Ali Cakmak present the Bioinformatics Labs research activities at ITU - TUSEB collaboration workshop held in Maslak Hilton Hotel.

entry.title: TÜSEB Project Positions Are Available!
entry.content: Scholars and project staff will be recruited for our genetic sequencing projects. Participants will receive training on genetic data analysis, more specifically the use of sequencing technologies, and will take part in current projects.
entry.summary: Scholars and project staff will be recruited for our genetic sequencing projects. Participants will receive training on genetic data analysis, more specifically the use of sequencing technologies, and will take part in current projects.

entry.title: Presentation by Dr. Ali Cakmak at Teknofest 2023

link.title: Presentation by Dr. Ali Cakmak at Teknofest 2023

entry.content: Dr. Cakmak gave a talk on predicting virus mutations at Teknofest 2023 in the AI in Health pavilion.
entry.summary: Dr. Cakmak gave a talk on predicting virus mutations at Teknofest 2023 in the AI in Health pavilion.

entry.title: Bioinformatics Referee at Teknofest 2023
entry.content: Dr. Cakmak took part in Teknofest 2023 as a referee for the Bioinformatics category.
entry.summary: Dr. Cakmak took part in Teknofest 2023 as a referee for the Bioinformatics category.

entry.title: We came 3rd best team at Teknofest’s AI in Health competitions

link.title: We came 3rd best team at Teknofest’s AI in Health competitions

entry.content: Our team has won a prestigious prize as the 3rd best team at Teknofest’s AI in Health competitions under the Bioinformatics category. Congratulations!
entry.summary: Our team has won a prestigious prize as the 3rd best team at Teknofest’s AI in Health competitions under the Bioinformatics category. Congratulations!

entry.title: Poster Presentation at HIBIT2020 Symposium
entry.content: Our recent work titled Optimizing Pipeline Combinations for Cancer Sequencing is presented at 13th The International Symposium on Health Informatics and Bioinformatics. You can click here to learn details about this poster.
entry.summary: Our recent work titled Optimizing Pipeline Combinations for Cancer Sequencing is presented at 13th The International Symposium on Health Informatics and Bioinformatics. You can click here to learn details about this poster.

entry.title: Congrats Batuhan Kısakol for acceptance to Integrate PhD training program

link.title: Congrats Batuhan Kısakol for acceptance to Integrate PhD training program

entry.content: Batuhan Kısakol has been accepted to Integrate PhD training program which is co-funded by Marrie Curie Actions of European Commission. Congrats!
entry.summary: Batuhan Kısakol has been accepted to Integrate PhD training program which is co-funded by Marrie Curie Actions of European Commission. Congrats!

entry.title: Poster Presentation at HIBIT2019 Symposium
entry.content: Master students Batuhan Kısakol and Mehmet Arif Ergün presented their poster titled “Evaluation of Cancer Sequencing Pipelines on Patient Samples with Different Heterogeneity Levels” at The International Symposium on Health Informatics and Bioinformatics.
entry.summary: Master students Batuhan Kısakol and Mehmet Arif Ergün presented their poster titled “Evaluation of Cancer Sequencing Pipelines on Patient Samples with Different Heterogeneity Levels” at The International Symposium on Health Informatics and Bioinformatics.
